greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)=A085956(3n).
program: (PARI) a(n) = {n = 3*n; p = 2; while (!(isprime(2*n*p+1) && (type(q=(p-1)/(2*n))== "t_INT") && isprime(q)), p = nextprime(p+1)); p;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 25 2014
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 22 2003
